definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: The spider web brushed my forehead.
A lock of dark hair curled across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 一綹蓬鬆的黑髮彎曲地掛在他的前額上。

sentences.english: Four golden characters meaning "Cultural Site of Shaolin" are carved above the stone archway.
sentences.chinese: 石坊正門前額刻着“少林勝蹟”四個金色大字。

sentences.english: Men tend to notice these lines on the forehead since they usually sleep with the face pressed face down on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 那些喜歡趴着睡覺的男士，則會發現前額出現皺紋。

sentences.english: I leaned over and touched my forehead to hers.
sentences.chinese: 我俯下身，用我的前額貼着她的額頭。

sentences.english: He had long, dark bangs and a suggestion of whiskers on his upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 他前額上的頭髮留得很長，上脣毛茸茸的。

sentences.english: High heels were invented by a woman who had been kissed on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋是由一位曾被人吻過前額的女性發明的。

sentences.english: With the same sunlight on our brow and hair.
sentences.chinese: 那普照的陽光照不到兩人的前額。

sentences.english: Osteoma is a common benign bone tumor, usually occurring inside the frontal sinuses and the mandible.
sentences.chinese: 骨瘤是一種很普遍的骨腫瘤，它通常發生於前額竇。

sentences.english: Mr Santini put his hand on my forehead.
sentences.chinese: 聖提尼先生把手放在我的前額摸了一下。

sentences.english: Suddenly there was a tremor in the air, and the sky seemed to kiss me on my forehead.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，一陣輕風吹過，天空彷彿在親吻我的前額。

sentences.english: He waves it around before slapping his forehead. "Aaah."
sentences.chinese: 他波，它周圍的前掌摑他的前額。

sentences.english: This song of mine will touch your forehead like a kiss of blessing.
sentences.chinese: 我這一隻歌將觸着你的前額，好像那祝福的接吻一樣。

sentences.english: He passed his hand across his forehead. It was dank with clammy sweat.
sentences.chinese: 他用手抹抹前額，額上滿是溼漉漉粘糊糊的汗珠。

sentences.english: He retook my hand and placed it on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次拿起我的手放在他的前額上。

sentences.english: Her hair hung limply over her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮蓬鬆地垂在前額上。

definition: temple (on the sides of human head)
top-heavy/fig. unbalance in organization or political structure
